markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Brooch of Shielding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=418)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 607 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This piece of silver or gold jewelry is adorned with miniature images of kite shields and can be used to fasten a cloak or cape. The brooch automatically absorbs [_magic missile_](/Spells.aspx?ID=180) spells targeting you. A _brooch of shielding_ can absorb 30 individual _magic missiles_ before it melts and becomes useless. Sometimes when found, a _brooch of shielding_ has already absorbed a number of missiles. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Brooch of Shielding
